name: workshop-claude-code-amaleh-2026-final
prompt:
Create a stunning workshop announcement poster.

CRITICAL: ALL text MUST be in Hebrew. Text must be CLEAR and READABLE.

Brand: Aviz - The Architect (אביז - האדריכל)
Colors: Primary bright green #22C55E, dark background #111827, gray accents
Style: Professional, modern, tech-forward, CINEMATIC

SCENE COMPOSITION:
- Dark office/tech room environment
- The avatar character sitting at a desk with an Apple iMac computer
- His face shows PURE AMAZEMENT - eyes wide, jaw dropped, absolutely mind-blown expression
- His hair is blown back dramatically by an invisible force

THE MAGIC MOMENT:
- From the computer screen, BRILLIANT GREEN ENERGY (#22C55E) explodes outward
- Green light rays, particles, electrical sparks fill the room
- The green glow illuminates his amazed face
- Lightning bolts of green energy arc through the air
- The whole scene feels like a moment of incredible discovery

LAYOUT:
- Avatar and computer in the CENTER-RIGHT of the image
- Leave space on the LEFT side for text overlay
- The energy creates a natural frame around the composition

TEXT TO INCLUDE (Hebrew, large and readable):
- Main title: קלוד קוד אמאל׳ה (big, bold, green)
- Subtitle: ה-$100 הכי מנוצלים אי פעם (white or light gray)
- Date/Time: יום חמישי 1.1.26 | 20:00
- Platform: Zoom
- Price: 50 ש״ח (make this visible but not dominant)
- Brand: Aviz - The Architect (small, corner)

The overall feeling: "This technology is going to change EVERYTHING"
